query:
ALTER TABLE defects 
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('reported', 'rca_pending', 'action_plan', 'assigned', 'in_progress', 'implemented', 'verification', 'effectiveness_check', 'closed', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'reported';
